example.code:
Remove-EC2Route -RouteTableId rtb-1a2b3c4d -DestinationCidrBlock 0.0.0.0/0
Confirm Are you sure you want to perform this action? Performing operation "Remove-EC2Route (DeleteRoute)" on Target "rtb-1a2b3c4d". [Y] Yes [A] Yes to All [N] No [L] No to All [S] Suspend [?] Help (default is "Y"):
example.description: This example deletes the specified route from the specified route table. You are prompted for confirmation before the operation proceeds, unless you also specify the Force parameter.
